[[inst_hl_lbuip]]
==== HL.LBUIP

*Syntax:* hl.lbuip [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long (48-bit) instruction encoding.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lbuip.svg[HL.LBUIP encoding,width=800]

*Uop-Class:* LDA/PAIR

*Compression:* HL48 (len=48)
